name: Z.O.M.B.I.E.S
description:
Game made during the Ludum dare 51 game jam.

Theme : Every 10 seconds.

You are in a graveyard during a dark and spooky night.

Try to kill the most zombies using weapons you will find in the level.

Every 10 seconds, zombies have a chance to rise from the tombs, but weapons have a chance to spawn too, good luck !
